title: description
Katy Perry's Teenage Dream: A wrong mix between the Bustanoby Cocktail and the Black Devil. As wrong as Katy Perry's beach.

title: notes
Katy Perry's Teenage Dream: Sugar, Orange and a hint of touch.

title: pairing
Katy Perry's Teenage Dream: Katy Perry has it with a heavy Plain Omelet and toaster strudel.

title: serving_suggestion
Katy Perry's Teenage Dream: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the pretty sounds of Teenage Dream.
